message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9500.  It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I can only pay up to $8500. I hope this meets within your acceptable range.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go that low.  How about $9000?  That's still a good price for you, and it's closer to what I need.  Let's try to make this work.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I understand the value of your product, but I can only pay $8750. I hope we can come to an agreement.
